name: Number C92: Heart-eartH Chaos Dragon
text:
4 Level 10 monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle. If a monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You gain LP equal to the damage they took. If this card has "Number 92: Heart-eartH Dragon" as material, it gains this effect.
● Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls, until the end of this turn. This activation and effect cannot be negated.
